mapper.select: SELECT B.BOARD_SEQ, B.BOARD_TYPE, B.TITLE, B.CONTENTS, B.REG_DATE, B.LOG_DATE FROM T_BOARD B ORDER BY B.REG_DATE DESC
SELECT B.BOARD_SEQ, B.BOARD_TYPE, B.TITLE, B.CONTENTS, B.REG_DATE, B.LOG_DATE FROM T_BOARD B WHERE B.BOARD_SEQ = #{boardSeq}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO T_BOARD (BOARD_TYPE, TITLE, CONTENTS, REG_DATE, LOG_DATE) VALUES (#{boardType}, #{title}, #{contents}, NOW(), NOW())
mapper.update: UPDATE T_BOARD SET BOARD_TYPE = #{boardType}, TITLE = #{title}, CONTENTS = #{contents}, LOG_DATE = NOW() WHERE BOARD_SEQ = #{boardSeq}
